Message.En: Battle for Fort Gritten: Fierce Battle
Message.Jp: グリッテン砦攻防戦　戦況：激戦

Message.En:
This is a high-difficulty large-scale battle that
is difficult to conquer without being an expert.
It is said that renowned warriors who have
slaughtered numerous Arisen in the past will
gather. Those with little combat experience will
not survive even for a few minutes. Prepare
yourself, as no one will come out unscathed
anymore.
Message.Jp:
熟練者でないと攻略が難しい高難度大規模戦闘だ
過去に何人もの覚者をほふった、いわくつきの
戦士らが集結するとみられる
戦闘経験の浅い者など数分と生き残れまい
もはや誰しも無傷では済まされないと覚悟しろ

Message.En:
Escort Fabio and defeat the enemy at the target
locations
Message.Jp: ファビオを護衛し、目標地点の敵を殲滅せよ

Message.En:
An Ambush Unit has appeared, offering a chance
for a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 急襲部隊が出現、戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the ambush unit you discovered and receive
a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した急襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Lured out the main force of the ambush unit. A
chance for War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 急襲部隊の本隊を誘い出した。戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the ambush unit you discovered and receive
a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した急襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
An Assault Unit has appeared, offering a chance
for a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 強襲部隊が出現、戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the assault unit you discovered and
receive a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した強襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Lured out the main force of the Assault Unit. A
chance for a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 強襲部隊の本隊を誘い出した。戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the assault unit you discovered and
receive a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した強襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Defeat the battalion commander and complete the
defense.
Message.Jp: 大隊長を撃破し、防衛を完遂せよ

Message.En:
Battle for Fort Gritten: Fierce Battle (Result
Reward)
Message.Jp: グリッテン砦攻防戦：激戦《リザルト報酬》

Message.En:
Even the most seasoned of us can be mortally
wounded.
It's a difficult, large-scale battle.
You can't go unscathed in the face of a powerful
enemy who has fought many battles in his career.
Message.Jp:
熟練者でも致命傷を負う可能性のある
難度の高い大規模戦闘となる
歴戦をくぐった強敵を前に無傷では済まされない
